reviewText: Excellent film, very dramatic, some of the best cinematography and settings imaginable

We received the DVD in record time, but it doesn't work on our DVD player nor any other in our school building. There were no warnings about this not working in US products. Since the seller was from the US, I took for granted that it would work when receiving it.
I feel like a better human being for having watched this. One of the things I am proudest to have in my collection.
